screenshots.caption: Download YouTube videos at very fast speeds

name: Free YouTube Downloader
short_description:
Free YouTube Downloader lets you easily download the video and audio from YouTube videos. From high definition 1080p videos, to high quality 320kbps MP3 music, Free YouTube Downloader also downloads videos that are playable on iPhone and Android devices.

On top of that, Free YouTube Downloader's download acceleration technology allows large downloads to reach speeds of up to 5 times faster than those of your regular web browser.

The freeware also lets users convert existing videos on their computer via a simple drag and drop to MP3, MP4, MOV, iPhone and Android formats. The option of adding album artwork to downloaded MP3s is also available, as well as the trimming, cutting out undesirable bits, of downloaded MP3s.

Finally, Free YouTube Downloader allows you to download custom files, specified from a direct link. Files that are downloaded in this way often reach speeds of up to five times faster than those of the regular web browser.
summary: Download high quality videos and audio from YouTube
